text: Gloxinia can refer to: *Gloxinia (genus), flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae *Sinningia speciosa, a plant species formerly classified in the genus Gloxinia and still commonly known by that name, in the family Gesneriaceae *Creeping gloxinia (Lophospermum erubescens), in the family Plantaginaceae, formerly in Scrophulariaceae *Hardy gloxinia (Incarvillea delavayi), in the family Bignoniaceae
title: Gloxinia
